description: Tired of being dragged down the pavement? This no-pull harness redirects your dog's forward momentum to the side, naturally discouraging pulling without choking or discomfort. The padded chest plate distributes pressure evenly, and four adjustment points ensure a snug, custom fit for any breed. Take back control of your daily walks.
features: Front-clip design gently redirects pulling without choking
Padded chest plate and straps prevent chafing and rubbing
Four adjustment points for a precise, custom fit
Reflective stitching for visibility during evening walks
Durable nylon construction with reinforced metal D-ring
